item.title: Car rams into RTC bus in Jogulamba Gadwal, passengers escape unhurt
item.description:
<![CDATA[Car rams into RTC bus in Jogulamba Gadwal, passengers escape unhurt
A speeding car collided with a Wanaparthy depot TGRTC bus on National Highway 44 near Jinkalapally on Saturday. Despite the bus being full, all passengers escaped unhurt. Traffic was briefly disrupted but later cleared by police and locals.
By Telangana Today Published Date - 4 October 2025, 11:13 AM
Representational Image.
Jogulamba Gadwal: A speeding car rammed into a TGRTC bus at Jinkalapally on National Highway 44 on Sat...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
